casebody.data:
Town of Monroe v. John C. Mandanici, Jr., et al. (12922)

Dupont, C. J., Heiman and Schaller, Js.

Argued April 27 decision released May 24, 1994 *916Joseph R. Mirrione, for the appellant (named defendant). William T. Browne, with whom, on the brief, was William J. Varese, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The judgments are affirmed and the case is remanded for the purpose of setting new law days.
